<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1283</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gambling and Halakha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen und Halakha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu et Halakha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gambling e Halakha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco e Halakha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι και Halakha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juego y Halakha</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Web-enhanced lesson on Sanhedrin 24b. learners learn about the social costs of gambling, study a Talmudic text and summarize what they have learned in a two-page essay</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sanhedrin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">web lesson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gambling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Halakha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">halacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Web-erhöhte Lektion auf Sanhedrin 24b. 
Anfängern erlernen über die Sozialkosten des Spielens, studieren 
einen Talmudic Text und fassen zusammen, was sie in einem Zweiseite 
Versuch erlernt haben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La leçon de Web-enhanced sur des étudiants
de Sanhedrin 24b. se renseignent sur les coûts sociaux de jeu, 
étudient un texte de Talmudic et récapitulent ce qu'ils ont appris 
dans un essai de deux-page</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a lição Web-realçada em learners de Sanhedrin 
24b. aprende sobre os custos sociais de gambling, estuda um texto de 
Talmudic e sumaria o que aprenderam em um essay da dois-página</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la lezione Web-aumentata sui principianti di 
Sanhedrin 24b. impara circa i costi sociali di gioco, studia un testo 
di Talmudic e ricapitola che cosa hanno imparato in un saggio della 
due-pagina</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Ιστός-ενισχυμένο μάθημα 24b. στους αρχαρίους 
Sanhedrin μαθαίνει για τις κοινωνικές δαπάνες, μελετά ένα του 
Ταλμούδ κείμενο και συνοψίζει τι έχουν μάθει σε ένα δοκίμιο 
δύο-σελίδων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La lección de Web-enhanced en los 
principiantes de Sanhedrin 24b. aprende sobre los costes sociales de 
juego, estudia un texto de Talmudic y resume lo que han aprendido en 
un ensayo de la dos-paginacio'n</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sanhedrin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Web-Lektion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halakha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">halacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
